story.text: WASHINGTON Jan 3 The Washington Post included the following items on the front page of its business section on Jan. 3. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy. --- HOUSTON - Richard Causey, Enron's ECSPQ.PK former chief accounting officer, was on his way Tuesday to a federal prison in Bastrop, Texas, to begin a 5-1/2 year sentence for his role in the fraud that destroyed the company. ---
story.title: press digest - washington post business - jan . 3
